page.title: 04LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: There is a{Sports Centre}at Belper High School.It has an indoor swimming pool,two squash courts and a sports hall providing a wide range of indoor sports facilities. Near the centre of the town is a {Sports Ground}which caters for football,cricket,tennis and bowls. Belper has an{Operatic Society,a Music {Theatre Group and an Art Centre. There are opportunities for group activities which include{Scouts,Guides {Cubs and Brownies. The{Riverside Pavilion}which is owned by{English Sewing}is used for Social activities. Riding,Golf and Fishing are popular rural activities.There are several parks for recreational activities. In the area there are{Conservative, {Labour and British Legion Clubs.
